lender.name: Anita
lender.occupational_info: My name is Anita. I'm 34yrs old, very decent, hardworking, polite and caring. I have a good well located store selling confectioneries, toiletries ect. I I work very hard to take care of my widow mother and also my younger brothers and sister in school. I'm asking for a loan of US $1500 to be able to expand my business to get more goods from branded companies for sale. I'm also a member of a lending group called "Sinapi Aba" and they provide support for each other. The members of the group known each other for a long time. Hope my humble request will meet your favorable consideration.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I hope to assist individuals in achieving their goals in life.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked as a teacher of young children and as an administrator in higher education.

lender.name: Seokjune
lender.loan_because: I can truly change people's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Computer Science major at Cal Poly SLO.

lender.name: Abena
lender.loan_because: Helping others build a life that matters to them, in small part because of my loan, feels really good :-)

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: My grandma told me about this wesite and i really wanted to make a difference in someones life, cause so many people have made a difference in my life. Being so young i figured i could take this as a learning opportunity.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with a wonderful life and I want to help other women.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of very sick babies in the hospital. Some of them are so small they can fit in my hand. It is wonderful to see them get better, grow and go home healthy with their families.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: Stay at home caring for my baby; before, I worked at an animal hospital.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I think its great that we have the opportunity to help others in need. If we have the power to help, then I think we should.

lender.name: Phil Hardaker
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to help people in the developing world. Helping is fun and makes me happy.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others achieve their dreams and goals
lender.occupational_info: I sell stuff on the internet as an internet marketer and use the internet to network with other people. I enjoy helping others in my work.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other families make the most of their opportunities.

I want you to be successful

lender.occupational_info: Nurse

lender.occupational_info: Online Marketing

lender.name: Peter

lender.occupational_info: I perform "shugyo." Shugyo is a Japanese term that means, "daily work you perform to better yourself." This is part of my shugyo.

lender.loan_because: I can and want to help.

lender.name: Brian

lender.occupational_info: I am a technical sales person for a software company. I support the technical aspect of software sales.

lender.name: Govindu Family

lender.occupational_info: I am first person of contact for clients of our advertising agency and do project management for all kind of campaigns my client requests.

lender.loan_because: I want to help the needy

lender.name: Christian Lürzer
lender.loan_because: I do not want to give a fish, i want to give a fishing rod.
lender.occupational_info: I do advertising.

lender.name: Robbie
lender.loan_because: I love to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help women and men in abusive relationships

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: Humanity is poorer if we end our community at the last house on our street, or at our nations borders. My family has a long history of creating and running small business’s, and from personal experience I know that small business’s and their owners are often disadvantaged by costs, continual hard work, and bank indifference, so it pleases me greatly that Kiva offers direct micro banking in this way

lender.name: Sharon & Randy
lender.loan_because: We all need each other. It's good to pass on what others have done for you.
lender.occupational_info: My husband sells food to restaurants, schools and hospitals... any place that serves food. I make quilts and hug grandbabies!!!

lender.name: chm
lender.loan_because: ... I can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to "make a difference" on a very real, very accessible level.

lender.name: Derrick
lender.whereabouts: Ho Chi Minh City Binh Thanh

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I make a little more money than the average person here in Canada (even though I am not formally trained in a trade), so I figure I might pass a little cash along to those who really need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a coffee shop either during the early hours of the morning, or over the entire afternoon baking the various products we sell.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can and we all should

lender.name: Mikko

Providing work is one way of helping. Giving tools for people to create their own jobs is another.
I dont believe in "normal" charity work. I have seen it close that it doesnt function properly.

lender.name: margot
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea all around

lender.name: Tracy

lender.name: Rena
lender.occupational_info: The best job I've ever had!

lender.loan_because: Strive to be a good steward, feel I have received abundance for that and want to share so others can experience the same gifts I have.

lender.name: Ricardo Tababa Jr.
lender.loan_because: It feels good helping others reach their goal.

lender.name: Team CODE
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a little smaller if we all work together to build up communities. And it feels great!
lender.occupational_info: We own a wine shop in Portland. We sell mostly organic products from regional producers.

lender.name: Jeff and Lourena
lender.loan_because: This is a way for us to help other business people start or expand their ventures with dignity and pride.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneurs-Healthcare and real estate.

lender.name: Meagan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: derek
lender.loan_because: i wish to share what i have with people less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: sharing is caring. what goes around, comes around.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I don't want anyone to go without.

lender.name: TK Li
lender.loan_because: I just want to help, and it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I sponsor 4 little girls living in South America through Children International (http://www.Children.org). I also volunteer in computer tutoring projects through New York Cares (http://www.nycares.org). Please check out http://www.modestneeds.org to help other needy families.

lender.name: martha
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference. Why else are we here?

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Small amounts added together can change lives. I was lucky enough to be financed in my busines by my father. Everyone is not so lucky.
lender.occupational_info: I have a mediterranean restaurant in West Sussex in the UK. I love my business and am excited to see it grow and get better and better.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being able to share my abundance with brothers and sisters around the world. To give someone a chance to make a change. To loan instead of give as a way for them to retain their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a City Planning Department where we have the vision of making our City a better place, to protect it and to return it to health.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a local university studying political science and international relations.

lender.name: Summer
lender.loan_because: Throughout life, everyone needs a hand from time to time. I have been supported by numerous individuals and organizations and feel it is an honor and privilege to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a health detective. I look for what is affecting individuals' and communities' health. I then figure out what needs to be done to improve their lives.

lender.name: FELC
lender.loan_because: We believe that supporting entrepreneurs in developing countries is important work that leads to stronger nations, stronger families and a stronger economy world-wide. We loan because we believe we have a responsibility to give back and to spread ethical and principled free enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: We are a part of the Free Enterprise Leadership Challenge, a summer camp hosted in North Carolina each year. During FELC, students work in small groups to create a product or service for other members of the camp. At the end of the week students can choose to keep the money or help developing entrepreneurs through Kiva.org

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that all people deserve quality education, based on individual needs, and quality health care as fundamental human right.
lender.occupational_info: I educate students with disabilities.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of directly being able to see what kind of impact my help has in the world. I picked four loans in Asia, Africa, America and Eastern Europe to spread my commitment all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I look after the financial situation of an young company that helps people to find the best restaurants and cafes in every city in the world.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I hope to see a connected, peaceful world.

lender.name: Maddy
lender.loan_because: I know it's the right thing to do. I think we all need to start helping those who need it even 25 dollars goes a long way in countries like these please take that in mind
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in highschool still so i must complete this first

lender.name: Cesáreo
lender.loan_because: ¿Why not? I needed loans in the past

lender.loan_because: I want people around the world to have the same opportunities that I have.
lender.occupational_info: I write websites.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live and work in a country where I don't have to worry about my future and my options are limitless. I would like others to feel secure in their own futures, and to help them accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to help good poeple who may need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that promotes a new and vital image of maturity.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: The future of a world worthy of life is dependent upon acts such as these and it is an honor and privilege to be a part of such activities.
lender.occupational_info: To observe and report in an effort to enlighten those who might in turn help the world become a better place to raise children and enjoy life.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: 2 Cor 9:6
lender.occupational_info: Check out a charity started by a friend: www.croso.org

lender.name: Arvin
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and wish to help other deserving people reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: My work for the past 38 years has been as a medical professional helping patients breath. I put people on machines and care for their breathing. (I currently specialize in neonatal intensive care)

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: Very happy

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: social enterprise is powerful and can lift the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations better utilize the unique talents of their people.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. 2 Corinthians 9:6-7
lender.occupational_info:
I help people generate more referrals for their business. It's actually a relationship building tool.
The same way Dell computers revolutionized the computer industry (& forced Compaq to give up & merge with HP) by:
- selling a product direct to the consumer vs through a re-seller - online vs from a store - custom built vs mass production - for a lower price
this company has revolutionized it's own industry.
It is still in it's early growth stages but at the rate it's growing, it will be a billion dollar company within roughly 5 to 7 years.
It's a network marketing company that allows business builders to be a part of this great company and it's growth.
Check out the company at the website below.

lender.name: Denny
lender.loan_because: Microfinance actually works.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at UW, albeit one who doesn't know what he's doing at the moment. I am always learning as I live, and plan to keep it that way.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: OverdriveElectronics.com
lender.loan_because: Everyone Deserves a chance to run a successful business. Those who work hard, succeed. Overdrive Electronics likes to help out those that have the initiative to work hard with the funds to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We sell brand name consumer electronics and accessories.

lender.name: Elaina
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. I don't make a lot of money, but I do feel priviledged enough to have what I need. And I want others to have that feeling also.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of disabled people.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: Because I like the idea of being closer to those I want to help. I love the idea of being able to expand the financial assistance by reinvesting the payback and make additional loans.
lender.occupational_info: I create web pages.

lender.name: Millie
lender.loan_because: I can either spend money on useless junk or help another human being.

lender.name: ACHMAD
lender.loan_because: I want to add my computer and accesories in my shop and internet cafe.
lender.occupational_info: I'm have a internet cafe in my city. every day i get US 10 . but now i want to build the my cafe for wide build. and i will add my computer for add user.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: Small business is the core of any economy and the toughest thing in small business is getting startup capital. This gives me the opportunity to use my success in helping someone get over a hurdle.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects for the transit authority in Houston.

lender.name: ecode media
lender.loan_because: Small things add up! We are all in this together so if we want a world full of love and respect then we have to start somewhere. Helping people out of poverty by providing them with the resources to do it by themselves is our moral responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: We help green and ethical businesses to market their products and services on the internet.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others who are less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the chance to work toward their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I teach dance in a public middle school.

lender.loan_because: Every little bit counts.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: it helps
lender.occupational_info: i teach english

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their passions.
lender.occupational_info: I work for I Love Evelyn (www.iloveevelyn.org) a group that focuses on loving the homeless, hurting and hungry, and finding new and practical ways to end those injustices.

lender.loan_because: I used to have businesses and I know how hard it is to get a loan - especially when you really need one.

lender.occupational_info: This is an ICT business and innovating new Technology that save people AUTO SHOP Expenses hence providing quality service and job creations for self economic empowerment.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves develop in their lives, just having a helping hand sometimes makes the difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to attain the goals that they decide that they would like to reach for themselves

lender.name: neal
lender.loan_because: I want to support the developing Countries in particular those of the former British Commenwealth.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances of a large Company

lender.loan_because: ...there are others far less fortunate (and far more deserving) than me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others how to improve their livelihoods through Internet marketing.

lender.name: Les
lender.loan_because: what you do for the least of these you do to me...God commands

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe if we all share our resources, everyone can have a quality life. I don't believe it's fair that others have while others do not.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to share the peace and love of God as a pastor. I seek to let EVERYONE know that we are fully loved and accepted by God and that God longs to be in relationship with each of us.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: We are all interconnected. Sometimes we can offer help, sometimes we need help. When we all work together the world becomes a better place.

lender.name: UPTHOUGHT
lender.occupational_info:
-------------------------------------------------------
UPTHOUGHT specializes in simple and powerful web development that does not cost a fortune.
Our team works remotely and can be found in Boston, Oregon, and Montreal, and makes it a point to keep overhead low, costs down, and our footprint small.
We are honored to be able to support growing businesses like ours throughout the world.
-------------------------------------------------------

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: All people need access to capital to support their communities and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach doctors how to use nutrition and herbal medicine with their patients.

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward
lender.occupational_info: I help people communicate

lender.name: ELISABETTA
lender.occupational_info: aerotaxi

lender.name: Salifu Ablie
lender.loan_because: I'm a student at the university and I acme from a financially poor background but I have a lot of plans to do small scale ventures in order to make profit and as well help me and my community from attain some amount of economic independence. I tried to contact different banks in my region but all that they say is that I do not have the collateral for their loans and so I do not QUALIFY..... Personally I believe that I can do it if I'm given the chance to have the startups fulfilled up to the level where I can find local financing
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently involved in leading long term projects of the Industries For Africa Foundation and I'm currently the leader of the small scale Glass Manufacturing Plant and the Cotton/Distributed Power Generation projects in the Gambia. I also do other private jobs to help make ends meet and this I will upon request give details about if anyone is interested

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I can. It's painless, and I can see the progress people are making with the money I've loaned.

lender.name: Alison
lender.occupation: Student of Development / Former Kiva Fellow
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to take care of their family and make their community a place that they want to live.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning about community-led poverty alleviation from an African perspective. I had the opportunity to work as a KF8 Kiva Fellow at K-MET in Kisumu, Kenya.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: My life is about making a difference in various ways- this is one small way I can do that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and speaker.

lender.name: veronica & yesi
lender.loan_because: this is an amazing opportunity to connect with others. I feel very grateful to 'meet' you business owners, as well as other like-minded humanists :-P
lender.occupational_info: In my work, I help people to assess and then address their insurance needs. This includes protecting their businesses, homes, autos, health, and life through various insurance products available today.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have an opportunity to make their life better .
lender.occupational_info: I work with foster kids (kids who were taken away from their parents by the state due to abuse or neglect) and help them find permanent people to be in their life.

lender.name: Sigrid
lender.loan_because: I got the account as a christmas present from my wonderful brother.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I am committed that Americans resurrect our image in the world. Doing things that are positive, generous and good. Loaning with Kiva is just a small step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I help customers install and configure software that helps large organizations be more effective.

lender.name: Polaris
lender.occupation: Land Steward/ Visual Artist/ Dj/ Promoter/ Human

lender.name: Beau
lender.loan_because: We in the west consume a disproportionate amount of the world's resources. We need to start equalizing the balance. I travel a lot and have seen the enormous economic disparities between countries and want to do something real about it.
lender.occupational_info: We investigate and expose Internet scams and other practices harmful to people.

lender.name: Kay P
lender.loan_because: it evens things up just a little bit.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I loan because sometimes we all need a little help from family, friends, and neighbors to make our dreams realities. It is great to help people who want to help themselves because good citizens making contributions to their societies is what every town needs to be strong and healthy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager of a Visual Information Team (Art, Photography, Graphics, Video). An image can always say a thousand words.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's the most creative way to give I've ever seen!

lender.name: Zain
lender.loan_because: as a former Peace Corps Volunteer in Uzbekistan, i've seen first-hand how a little loan or grant can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: through my travels and work, i create friends, bonds, and facilitate education. i write about my experiences and talk about my findings to people in the United States who may not understand people from other cultures or nations.

lender.name: Derek

lender.occupational_info: I work for an organisation that advises and assists local government in the East End of London on projects to improve quality of life and communities in those areas.

lender.name: Aaron

lender.occupational_info: I am currently taking a break from the working world and instead find myself traveling to experience different cultures.

lender.name: Bo Sellitti
lender.loan_because: Helping one person get a start up with a relatively small sum of money can do so much to improve his or her life, his or her family, and the local economy. I loan because it is an easy way to do my part.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It is an obligation to help others achieve prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I use my experience in trading, analysis, technology, and risk management to identify stellar investment opportunities

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: My sister got me into Keva and it feels good to help out others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a math student at the University. I am putting myself through school, so I understand that everyone can use a little help.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I can (do even a little) therefore I should.
lender.occupational_info: 1 - Aerialist: performing high in the air on a trapeze or hanging fabrics. 2 - Massage Therapist: healing through touch and energy.

lender.name: Kirileigh
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I do scientific research spanning a variety of fields: clinical, analytical chemistry, environmental science, physical chemistry, and medical sciences.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to encourage people to be responsible and self sufficient and give them an opportunity I wish someone had given me.
lender.occupational_info: I write and deliver computer software training and develop policies and procedures (written instructions) for processes for people to do their job more efficiently.

lender.name: The Alaska Pack
lender.loan_because: Our children are learning that one less toy means another person is one step closer to obtaining the means to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We try to make people well again so that they can be independent.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: a small way of lending a helping hand to less fortunate but resourceful people.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better more simple way to truly help and encourage global growth and stability. The lasting effect and the potential created from a Kiva loan is priceless. The best part - you can have the same $100 work over and over again for the cause.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I would like to give back to the people in some the countries I've been fortunate enough to travel to & hope to see in the future. Because they have given me so much in life experiences.
lender.occupational_info: I work behind the camera. In the technical field. Basically, I watch TV all day, I just don't get to change the channel.

lender.name: Marek
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs raise funds to start their business.

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: we need to help others more.

lender.name: Kylie
lender.loan_because: even my small donation can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: Product development that is focused on creating the best possible outcome for the client and the planet.

lender.name: Passion
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Heaslip Family
lender.loan_because: Becuase we are fortunate enough to be able.

lender.name: jason
lender.loan_because: I like to see other people "having a go" to better their lives.

lender.name: Kaye, Mark, Matt & Ben
lender.loan_because: It is our social responsibility to help those with less in the world. This is a great way to help at a grass roots level. It is nice to see the faces of those that we are able to help in a small way. We want our children to grow up and think of the whole planet as one home and one family.

lender.name: kate
lender.loan_because: i've long been interested in micro-finance and was excited to find i could actually participate in it! the idea appeals to me so much more than a donation as lending allows the same money to help again and again, while also preserving the recipients' dignity and self-respect.
lender.occupational_info: my partner and i own a small independent liquor store in regional australia and support our family of two young girls.

lender.name: wiwik
lender.loan_because: I believe that women need to be empowered to provide a better life for their family,children, and for themselves. I couldn't have started my business without help and I want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in broadcasting media as gate keeper. this job help people in public service.n i want to have side job to sell thing in fashions, such as clothing.

lender.name: Sachiko
lender.loan_because: It is important for people to have the choices.

lender.name: TPK
lender.loan_because: I am doing well in life and I want the rest of the world to do well too. I believe everyone should give and that is the way to solve the ills of today.

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: It is worth sharing some of my money with less privileged people. Also I like that they have ideas and an ambition and I feel giving them a loan rather than a donation is more respectful and trustful.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of Software Developers in a large worldwide IT company. I am located in Germany.

lender.name: sabine
lender.loan_because: we are all belonging together
lender.occupational_info: I design together with nice people from Czech republic textiles for seats in cars

lender.name: Fennie
lender.loan_because: this is a straightforward way of increasing opportunities
lender.occupational_info: provide financial products to big companies

lender.name: jeff & tu
lender.loan_because: i'd rather help someone who is committed to helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I put together medical programs that involve both western and complementary medicine.

lender.name: The Wilsons
lender.loan_because: In a small way we can help others.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who want to help themselves

lender.name: Jesper
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepeneurs in developing countries create a better life for their families - and their fellow citizens
lender.occupational_info: I am a business lawyer

lender.name: Kary
lender.loan_because: "Kindness in Giving creates Love "- Lao Tzu
lender.occupational_info: I create art . While this is my love ... helping homeless dogs is my passion.

lender.name: Shvets
lender.loan_because: Hello! His business, I do not want to open yet. I am a normal girl with average wealth, so I need finance for the children. But I do with children. We have many children in Ukraine who have no relatives. My dream-to help these children settle in life. I believe the girl. I need sponsors that have helped me to reorganize the children's home. I need your help.

lender.name: Aine
lender.loan_because: it's great to be able to support women and families trying to improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: I look after and care for women and their families throughout pregnancy, childbirth and early parenthood

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: To give back and serve the lord. It is something my mom and I can do together.

lender.name: Graciela
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help others help themselves. Much better than giving money because when people achieve things for themselves, they feel proud, satisfied and more motivated to continue. They also acquire greater self-confidence.
lender.occupational_info: I tutor students with their school English and French. Also teach English to adults who want to either learn the language from 0 or improve it.

lender.name: Dorte
lender.loan_because: I think it is a very good way to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a volunteer in Nepal. Helping the very poor to be able to take a loan later.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
Bill Clinton's book "Giving" spoke about Kiva and I knew immediately that I wanted to be involved with this.
I like the proverb "Show a man and he'll teach no-one. Show a woman and she'll teach the village." Another proverb I like is "Money is like manure. You've got to spread it around to let small things grow."
The idea of being a like a small bank is such a wonderful idea! To be directly contributing to people growing their businesses in places that are tiny specks on a map is just an awesome concept!
lender.occupational_info:
I work as a website developer in the government sector. My organisation serves an area with a population of over 100,000 people, providing services from children's health, youth services, aged care, health, events, infrastructure and more.
The website I develop helps people learn about our activities and how we can help them in their lives.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is important to act on both the micro and macro levels. I lend to improve the situation for an individual/community AND I agitate with my government for an improvement based in their foreign affairs policies.
lender.occupational_info: I am primarily a weaver of tapestry and cloth. I also make jewellry using a lacemaking technique.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help, and doing it this way just feels right!

lender.name: Quench Bath & Body
lender.loan_because: This is a way to help people to help themselves. Also, being a small business owner, I know how it can end up being a viscious cycle when you can't grow your business unless you have X, which you cannot get until you have the money to buy Y.
lender.occupational_info: I own a bath and body products company that specializes in traditional beauty rituals from around the world. We find these products, and then buy either the finished products or the ingredients needed from the country of origin, ideally from a coop, or a small busines owner in the country, and make the product available to consumers here in the US.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: My owners gave me a second chance and I believe it is important to pay it forward!

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: JAN
lender.loan_because: It can change people's lives and fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Design & photography

lender.name: Poverty2Prosperity
lender.loan_because: http://Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) engages in poverty alleviating projects. One major project is to provide microloans through the Kiva platform. You can help support P2P by joining our lending team here: http://www.kiva.org/team/poverty2prosperity
lender.occupational_info: One of P2P's major poverty alleviating projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/poverty2prosperityPF

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: I was lucky in my life... it wasn't hard to get money i have, so i can give them to someone. Second reason is that i love people trying to do business with few money.
lender.occupational_info: I started building websites... now i have some websites that give me revenue

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I'm riding round the world on an old motorcycle and I enjoy helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I don't have much money myself and I enjoy people pulling themselves up by their bootstraps.

lender.name: rick
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I would like to help other single mothers achieve their dreams

lender.name: anjachristina
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money for me can make a little difference in the life of someone else. If I can help someone start a business or earn a living better with this loan, I´m happy to do it!
lender.occupational_info: I am working in the engine development of a german car manufacturer.

lender.name: michelle natividad
lender.loan_because: its a way to extend GODS helping hands. its my lil way of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: i do physical therapy for adults and kids.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I try to fight poverty and misery through Nonviolent Radical Party ( http://www.radicalparty.org )

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I've seen firsthand the effectiveness of people-to-people loans in a wide variety of settings while doing work abroad - from water infrastructure in Nicaragua to women's federations in India.

lender.name: Sarah & Kevin
lender.occupation: Fleet Maintenance Supervisor and Dir. of Outreach
lender.loan_because: We care what happens to our brothers & sisters in Christ!
lender.occupational_info:
Kevin is in charge of the people who make sure all of the vehicles his town uses (i.e. police, fire trucks, garbage trucks) runs properly.
Sarah works for a church getting the members active in volunteer work locally, nationally & internationally - she helps people help people.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.loan_because: Those of us that are lucky enough to live in a country with lots of wealth and opportunities should try to help out those in other countries that don't have the same benefits.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with phyiscal injuries and emotional stress by providing massage therapy to relax and heal.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Kerstin
lender.loan_because: I will give people the same chance as we can profit to lend money tin order to build an own existence.

lender.name: Abner
lender.loan_because: "We are born with two hands, one to help ourselves, and the other to help others"
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Medical Laboratory Science student.

lender.name: Rowan
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by the stories.
lender.occupational_info: Self-employed. :)

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the individuals' stories -- especially the women. And I want to help eliminate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a foundation that makes grants & scholarships in the greater Seattle, Washington (USA) area.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: its a direct way to help people realize their dreams for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with university students helping them to develop and implement capacity building projects with communities around the world.

lender.name: Samara
lender.loan_because: Social justice can't wait.
lender.occupational_info: I help remove barriers to reproductive health care for low income women, women of color, women in rural areas, and immigrant women in California.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.occupational_info: I go to school at Cal Poly in San Luis Obispo

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: Microfinance changes lives!
lender.occupational_info: Global Poverty Research

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I can help people in a very real way in a different part of the world.

lender.name: djovida
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my lifetime and now is the time to help someone else with their fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I am a broadcast engineer. I spend my time at work trying to keep everything running smoothly

lender.name: Peace Lutheran Church
lender.occupation: MORE discussion group from Peace Lutheran Church

lender.name: Maxim G
lender.loan_because: I feel the urge to help the country of my birth, one of the poorest countries in the world.

lender.name: Mabel
lender.loan_because: I think the whole concept of Kiva encouraging people to reach across the world to connect with one another is truly an inspired idea. That, and the fact that I get to see this picture of me with my beautiful new little godsonpup, Fella, every time I make a loan makes lending here particularly sweet.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired as a teacher but I love being with children so I still substitute at the inner-city elementary school near me where I used to teach full time. I also teach piano and Sunday School.

lender.name: Basaran Family
lender.loan_because:
We have 2 beautiful children adopted from Peru. I was blessed to be able to travel the country extensively in 2004, and experienced the warmth and dedication of the people trying to make a better life for their children. We also saw a huge improvement in the daily lives of the people, having witnessed personally hyper-inflation and the Shining Path days in 1989.
We are proud to give back to honour our children and their heritage. The photo shows my daughter Maritza and I on a reed boat in Lake Titicaca in 2004.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: We are all people sharing the same planet and we should help each other to have happy and useful lives. I live in a country where we have everything we need but a lot do not so I want to share what I have to help others.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a refrigerated truck to deliver fresh chicken meat and vegetables to the shops. We also have one employee who works on the days when my husband does not. I do the bookkeeping and paperwork for our business. I also have a job for another company during the week.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student studying Sustainability and Russian Studies.

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: it's time for me to give back to the global community.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I hope to promote peace by helping energetic people prosper..
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I own a small plumbing business. We help ensure our community has safe, clean water.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Life is too valuable to be restricted because of what you've started with.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers to either fix them when they break or make them work better for people in my community.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: Others deserve to have some of the same opportunities I had to fulfill my dreams of raising a happy, healthy family
lender.occupational_info: I am a practicing Orthopedic Surgeon

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: we are all one family - brothers and sisters should help one another.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It's so very cool to do good.
lender.occupational_info: Studying to work as a developer of sustainable communities.

lender.name: Lyndsay
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: My aunt started me with a gift donation... and I'm so glad she did - I had heard about this site months ago and it slipped my mind! While I don't have a lot of excess money, I think it's important to do unto others the way I'd like to be treated. You know, the golden rule.

lender.name: Gareth
lender.loan_because: I can and I've been loaned money.

lender.name: MaBiJaRi
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping as many people live the life they dream of. We have been lucky enough to be able to live our life the way we want it to be. And we want lead by example for our two beautiful daughters. So they know how awesome it is to help someone achieve their goals and dreams. And in return, we achieve ours too.

lender.name: Stormie
lender.loan_because: Bettering the status of women betters the world.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of sharing. We must strengthen our sister communities as we strengthen our own community. Sharing our resources is a quiet but powerful way to do this.
lender.occupational_info: My work is about empowering individuals to manage their own legal issues when they don't have money to buy legal services.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I have had a very fortunate life and I feel like I can make a little difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the risk management department within a financial firm.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people provide a better future for their families.

lender.name: Rob
lender.occupation: Former Kiva Fellow, Current Foreign Service Office

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: I believe that person to person connection is the bedrock of happiness.

lender.name: Ernest
lender.loan_because: want others happy
lender.occupational_info: long working hours, high competitive

lender.name: Anderson family
lender.loan_because: These loans are offered in memory of Renate Fried Ornea of San Leandro, CA, a wonderful soul who freely shared with others.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: Having lived in 3rd world countries, I have seen how hard it is for some people to find the means to start a business or expand their business. This program allows me to help people who are trying to make a difference in the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing, Promotions and Event coordination of Cruise Vendors.

lender.name: chantelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that everybody needs a little help to get ahead and If I can make somebody's life better then so be it.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to improve the quality of their lives.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: It's been said before. Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him to fish and he will eat for the rest of his life.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: It's a much better bet putting your faith in people than it is on the lottery.

lender.name: Luanne
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great opportunity to give back and help out others in need.

lender.name: Hsueh Yu
lender.loan_because: This is my special birthday gift from my America mom

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I like to help others who have been less fortunate in life than myself and my family. We are all our brothers keepers.
lender.occupational_info: I was an aircraft engineer before retiring. Now I do volunteer work.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I want others in the world to have the chance to better their lives. I am very thankful for the life that I am able to live and want to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Dental Hygienist which means I clean peoples teeth and teach them how to take care of their mouths.
